mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE( cid, title, content) VALUES( #{cid}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select a.brdnum as brdnum , a.* from( select * from article order by brdnum desc) A limit 0,5
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ARTICLE WHERE BRDNUM LIKE #{brdNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE ARTICLE SET TITLE = #{title} , CONTENT = #{content} WHERE brdNum LIKE #{brdNum}
